content: This would be incredibly helpful! I often browse late at night and the current bright theme is quite harsh on the eyes.
Thanks for the feedback! We're planning to include an auto-scheduling feature too, so it switches automatically at sunset.
Please also consider a high contrast mode for accessibility. Dark mode alone might not be enough for users with visual impairments.
The current search is too basic. I often can't find older requests even when I know they exist.
Absolutely agree! I'm working on designs for advanced filters that should address this. Will share mockups soon.
A mobile app would be game-changing! Push notifications for status updates would keep the community more engaged.
Just make sure to include offline reading. Sometimes I want to browse requests without an internet connection.
This feature was implemented perfectly! The CSV export includes all the fields I need for my analysis. Thank you!
Email notifications would help so much with community engagement. Many users lose track of their favorite requests.
This would save so much time! I've accidentally created duplicates before because I couldn't find similar existing requests.
